extendedInfo.description: One of the best zombie games out right now! Zombies & Karate Kids is a feature game action packed with a variety of different characters that can be used to fight against the invading zombies with a choice of revolutionary weapons! These weapons include Samuraiâs, Arrows and more. Youâll need to think on your feet and strategically tactical to ensure that you preserve your best fighters for the later more difficult levels when more and more zombies begin to attack! So be very careful with your limited supply of coins as you battle wave after wave of zombies to ensure that you make it right to the end of the game.It is a favourite for all ages and is guaranteed to have you on the edge of your seat. As well as being a free app it also has all of the following amazing features:â¢ Three Action Packed Levelsâ¢ Three Amazingly Gifted Karate Kid Characters that you're bound to fall in love with!â¢ Buy unlimited coins from the Main Menuâ¢ Battle multiple different types of zombies on all levelsAbout Zombies & Karate Kids:The game uses several different level types and layouts. The game starts out in the front garden of the castle, and progresses to night time levels in various weather conditions, where the game play is more challenging. The final level provides the greatest challenge of all right in the middle of the forest. Sporadically through the game, the player is warned about the wave of zombies approaching and clues as to where the zombies will attack more frequently making the game one of the most strategical gaming apps ever made. Download this free app today and enjoy this action packed never ending adventure!We value your feedback and would therefore greatly appreciate it if you could leave a review so that we can make improvements to the game.
